title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Ranks)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Ranks) 

Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited garda siochana (ranks) regulation 2020

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. (1) The members of the Garda Síochána, other than reserve members,
text_raw:
2. (1) The members of the Garda Síochána, other than reserve members, 

are to be divided into the ranks specified in column (1) of the Schedule. 

(2) The maximum number of members in each rank specified in column (1) 
of the Schedule is that specified in column (2) of that Schedule opposite the 
mention of the rank in column (1).
text_norm: 2 (1) member garda siochana reserve member divided rank specified column (1) schedule (2) maximum number member rank specified column (1) schedule specified column (2) schedule opposite mention rank column (1)

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. The Garda Síochána (Ranks)(No. 2) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 390 of
text_raw:
3. The Garda Síochána (Ranks)(No. 2) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 390 of 

2009) are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [287] 3
text_norm: 3 garda siochana (ranks)(no 2) regulation 2009 (s.i no 390 2009) revoked notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th august 2020 287 3
